ThingDef.Name: ZT_BHJM
ThingDef.Desc: In ancient times, Hongmeng flooded the earth and the energy of Hongmeng was too rich, making countless immortals in the ancient continent. However, Hongmeng was not renewable, and every one of them lost a little, but few knew it. The black emperor, who has overhauled the race, sees the sky, knowing that if Hongmeng's energy is exhausted, it will usher in a catastrophe. The Black Emperor issued a fairy sword order, and first called his immortal friends, and then informed the spirit, demon, and demon to go to the world of humankind, and wanted to resist the calamity with the three races. However, the other three clan speculations, the three clan have long wanted to destroy the human race, so that three points of the ancient continent. In the world of the four races, the three races saw that the time had come. The three races were able to separate their hands. The tribe was strong, but they were always outnumbered. The black emperor saw the power of the tribe fell. The ancient secret treasure of his own primitive god, "Nirvana Immortal * Eight Desolate Extinctions", broke the tribal alliance with his own strength. However, the ancient secret treasure was far more powerful than thought. The ancient continent was divided into six. The black emperor stepped out of the void and the rest The human monks exiled the demons, spirits, and demons to three different continents. Many years later, people did not know that the current human-god realm was originally separated from the ancient continent. The turbulence of the space and time in the other world has linked the six realms to each other. The ancient treasures that originally consumed the power of the gods have once again appeared in the human-god realm. . It is a pity that now the human and god world has no vitality. . machete by 40M
